parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the specified reference as defined in swRefPlaneReferenceIndex_e

title: IRefPlaneFeatureData.AngleOrDistance
description: Gets or sets the angle or distance of the specified reference for this reference plane feature.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the specified reference as defined in swRefPlaneReferenceIndex_e

remarks:
IMPORTANT:
Reference planes created in SOLIDWORKS 2010 or later are constraint based; reference planes created in SOLIDWORKS 2009 or earlier are not. See the
Remarks
section in the
IRefPlaneFeatureData interface
topic for details about reference planes and this interface.
